titleStmt.title: A plaine path to perfect vertue: deuised and found out by Mancinus a Latine poet, and translated into English by G. Turberuile gentleman
De quatuor virtutibus. English
titleStmt.author: Mancinus, Dominicus, fl. 1478-1491.
Turberville, George, 1540?-1610?

publicationStmt.publisher: In Knightrider strete, by Henry Bynneman, for Leonard Maylard,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Mancinus, Dominicus. "Mancinus de quatuor virtutibus", first published in 1584 (STC 17239.3).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
